messages.content:
According to Rajesh Malhotra's medical history, he is currently taking the following medications and supplements:

1. Ashwagandha - Supplement, taken occasionally as needed 
2. Multivitamin - Supplement, 1 tablet taken daily

The record indicates he is not taking any prescription medications at this time. The notes mention he was diagnosed with Stage 2 Hypertension in April 2025 and has been trying lifestyle modifications first before starting medication treatment.
